name: 邱弘緯
schedule:
This course will focus on the analysis of big patent data using nature language processing.

Week 1        Course Introduction　　
Week 2        Introduction to system theory
Week 3        Python lab - Basic skill　　
Week 4        Introduction to Logic 
Week 5        Python lab - Control system　　
Week 6        Patent law　　
Week 7        Patent search
Week 8        Python lab -  Regular expression
Week 9        Mid-term project
Week 10      Patent big data
Week 11      Patent lab - Basic data types
Week 12      Patent analysis　　
Week 13      Python lab - Advanced data types
Week 14      Nature language processing
Week 15      Python lab - Nature language processing
Week 16      Patent application
Week 17      Python lab - text generation
Week 18      Final project
scorePolicy:
1. Homework assignments - 40%
2. Mid-term project 30%
3. Final proejct 30%

NOTE:If you wish to brush up on your Python, you may download easy-to-use Jupyter Notebooks covering various aspects of Python from https://github.com/jakevdp/PythonDataScienceHandbook. I think you will find them useful.The course also assumes that you have a good understanding of linear algebra, calculus (particularly derivatives), and statistics & probability. The following blog provides a list of useful resources for reviewing concepts from these topics.
materials:
